com.alprael.readwithoutme.controller

Class ListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<BooksRead>
        • com.alprael.readwithoutme.controller.ListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, Filterable, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter

    public class ListAdapter
extends ArrayAdapter<BooksRead>
    This class defines and Array Adapter in the form of a list view in the user info section of the app. It displays the user ID, book name, and book read time from the BooksRead entity and updates accordingly as more data is inserted.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION
